title: Recruiter
content:
To reinvent an industry, you have to build the best team. Join Formlabs if you want to bring groundbreaking professional 3D printers to the desktop of every designer, engineer, researcher, and artist in the world. Our printers are used by Google, Tesla, Gillette, and New Balance, just to name a few.
Founded in Boston in 2011, Formlabs is now one of the leading 3D printer manufacturers in the world. We opened our Budapest office to establish key Engineering and Business teams in the region, and we’re still a growing team of 100+ dedicated people. Our EMEA Recruiting team hires a wide spectrum of talent, spanning from sales, marketing, and service agents to software engineers, applications, and operations specialists. 
We are looking for an experienced Recruiter based in Budapest to level up our team. You will partner with the Global Recruitment and People and Culture team, and build strong relationships with hiring managers, leaders, and employees across Formlabs through your work. 
Join us if you’re ready to make a global impact through local candidates, and build the future of 3D printing. We pride ourselves on identifying the best talent and strengthening our teams as we continue to develop world class 3D printing ecosystems for our users.
 The Job:

Partner with hiring managers and leaders to prioritize hiring goals with a constant focus on diversity, belonging and inclusion
Source, interview, and hire quality candidates across all departments
Balance candidate experience by providing timely communication and advocating for your candidates, while consistently landing on the right decisions for the business
Recommend and drive improvements to enhance and scale our overall recruiting practices
Keep Formlabs a great place to work by finding new Formlings that add to our culture
Identify talent branding opportunities to attract talent by broadening our visibility in our European locations (engineering meetups, networking events, speaking opportunities, campus presence, and other creative ideas) 

You:

Have 5+ years of full-cycle recruiting experience – from sourcing passive candidates to negotiating offers
Are fluent in English and Hungarian
Are comfortable navigating an ATS (we use Greenhouse)
Ready to jump in and support hiring needs across the company: tech, services, sales, marketing, finance, etc.
Have extensive experience recruiting for engineering roles
Have a deep understanding of creative sourcing strategies to find and engage with passive talent
Have strong written and verbal communication skills and craft unique, effective messaging to candidates
Naturally tend towards data to track results and improve process
Love to establish links and meet new people
Have experience in executing employer branding projects 

Bonus Skills: 

German speaking 
Recruitment agency experience
Passion for technology and 3D printing

We offer:

Monthly Wolt credits (70000 HUF/month) for food delivery to the office
Private health insurance with Medicover (Blue package + hospital coverage)
A monthly or quarterly public transportation pass for Budapest
Free beverages and snacks at the office
All You Can Move sports pass with 7000 HUF monthly allowance
Free 3D prints
An inclusive, dog-friendly office with diverse and inspiring colleagues
Development opportunities both in-house and off-site

We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company.  We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.  
Even if you don't check every box, but see yourself contributing, please apply. Help us build an inclusive community that will change the face of 3D printing.

questions.label: This role has an on site requirement of 3 days per week at our Budapest office. Are you able to regularly commute or relocate to the area?
